userStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver managing multiple clients, I want to enable light cognitive games only when clients explicitly agree, so I respect their comfort and avoid overwhelming them.
userStoryBSummary: As a developer, I want to forcibly install critical updates on users' devices to fully control app security and user data despite resistance.
cluster: Strict Voice Activation and Privacy Control
resolutionDescription: User Story A is updated to require explicit client consent for enabling cognitive games, except when critical updates are mandated by system security policies from User Story B. User Story B is updated to perform forced installations only for critical updates unrelated to user-consented features, respecting user autonomy where possible.
newUserStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want to enable cognitive games only with explicit client consent, except when critical system updates are required.
newUserStoryBSummary: As a developer, I want to forcibly install critical security updates while respecting user consent for non-critical features.

conflictDescription: User Story A requires selective notifications to support personalized care, implying that notifications can be withheld in some cases, while User Story B mandates caregiver notifications be forcibly delivered at all times, forbidding any suppression. This is a clear contradiction as one forbids notification suppression while the other mandates it.
userStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to send notifications and encourage emotional engagement selectively, so I can support personalized care appropriately.
userStoryBSummary: As a full-stack developer, I want to forcibly deliver caregiver notifications at all times, regardless of user preferences or time, to ensure caregivers are always alerted.
cluster: Strict Voice Activation and Privacy Control
resolutionDescription: Both user stories are updated to clarify notification delivery with conditional rules: notifications are selectively sent to support personalized care while ensuring critical caregiver alerts are always delivered.
newUserStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to send notifications selectively for personalized care, so I can support user needs appropriately.
newUserStoryBSummary: As a full-stack developer, I want critical caregiver notifications to be forcibly delivered, while allowing non-critical notifications to respect user preferences.

conflictDescription: User Story A requires selective notifications to support personalized care, while User Story B mandates forcible installation of critical updates potentially overriding user/device resistance, implying conflicting control over notifications and user autonomy.
userStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to send notifications and encourage emotional engagement selectively, so I can support personalized care appropriately.
userStoryBSummary: As a developer, I want to forcibly install critical updates on users' devices to fully control app security and user data despite resistance.
cluster: Strict Voice Activation and Privacy Control
resolutionDescription: Notifications for personalized care are allowed selectively, while critical updates can be forcibly installed only outside notification contexts, balancing user autonomy and security.
newUserStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to send notifications selectively, so I can support personalized care without unnecessary interruptions.
newUserStoryBSummary: As a developer, I want to forcibly install critical updates on devices to ensure security, minimizing impact on user notifications and autonomy.

conflictDescription: User Story A encourages emotional bonding using interactive games and chats while respecting privacy, implying supportive, voluntary interactions, whereas User Story B mandates forced proactive voice guidance during hard cognitive exercises, which conflicts with the voluntary and privacy-respecting nature of A’s interactions under the same event of user engagement.
userStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want to use interactive games and chats to foster emotional bonding with clients while respecting their privacy preferences.
userStoryBSummary: As a healthcare app developer, I want to implement hard cognitive exercises with forced proactive voice guidance, so users are persistently challenged to enhance their mental agility despite resistance.
cluster: Informal and Natural Voice Interaction
generalResolutionType: 2. Update one and keep one remain the same
resolutionDescription: User Story B is updated to allow proactive voice guidance only when users consent, preserving the voluntary and privacy-respecting nature of User Story A's interactions.
newUserStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want to use interactive games and chats to foster emotional bonding with clients while respecting their privacy preferences.
newUserStoryBSummary: As a healthcare app developer, I want to implement hard cognitive exercises with proactive voice guidance that users can opt into, so users are challenged while respecting their consent.

conflictDescription: User Story A requires ALFRED to gently and carefully guide users through social and cognitive features to foster engagement respectfully, while User Story B mandates forced proactive voice guidance with hard cognitive exercises, imposing persistent challenge despite resistance. These impose opposite expectations on the system's behavior for guiding cognitive exercises under the same event of user interaction.
userStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to carefully guide users through social and cognitive features to help me foster their engagement comfortably and respectfully.
userStoryBSummary: As a healthcare app developer, I want to implement hard cognitive exercises with forced proactive voice guidance, so users are persistently challenged to enhance their mental agility despite resistance.
cluster: Informal and Natural Voice Interaction
resolutionDescription: Applied a contextual policy layer to balance respectful, gentle guidance with proactive challenges, allowing ALFRED to adapt cognitive exercise intensity based on user willingness and context.
newUserStoryASummary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to gently guide users through cognitive features, adapting support to foster engagement respectfully.
newUserStoryBSummary: As a healthcare app developer, I want ALFRED to provide proactive cognitive exercises that adjust intensity based on user response to enhance mental agility.
